# 載入套件
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(jiebaR)
library(jiebaRD)
library(wordcloud2)
```

# 讀文檔
```{r}
setwd("C:/Users/jeff6/Desktop/Github/alan/Week2-4")
data <- readChar("CUG.txt",720000)
str(data)
```

# 斷詞工具
```{r}
cutter <- worker(stop_word = "C:/Users/jeff6/Desktop/Github/alan/Week2-4/a.txt")#新增停用詞
new_user_word(cutter, "老孫")#新增詞句
```

# 斷詞
```{r}
x <- segment(data,cutter)
x <- sort(table(x),decreasing = T)[1:50]#排序x取1~50
x <- data.frame(x)
x
```

# 文字雲
```{r}
wordcloud2(x,
           size = 2,
           fontFamily = "微软雅黑",
           color = "random-light",
           backgroundColor = "black",
           shape = "triangle",
           gridSize = 4)
```
